title: I cant log in with my account?
body: so i got an email saying i can get into the alpha client and ive been excepted and i downloaded it but it says my account does not have access to the client....how do i fix this?

replies.body: Are there any other accounts that you signed up with that was accepted?  You can double check your application status through your account's [management ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751934-General-Account-Information)page.  Hope that helps!
That section of the management page seems to have disappeared when the signups closed.
I dont think you can check that anymore, the section is gone.
nope i only got the email to the account i signed up with and i checked the others don't work anyway... so why did is say i got excepted but not let me in?
If you're absolutely sure you signed up, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can check this out.  We'll respond asap!
